"Well, you shall be amazed at how much Liono screwed up the future, but you=
 should go and get aquainted with some of the other bots." Airbomber said t=
o Infectra...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  To=
: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, July 06, 2000 4:43 PM
  Subject: Re=
: Neo Beast Wars


  *Infectra nodded and looked around* Infectra: What sho=
uld I expect to happen or find out here? *Infectra says to The Radicons*
  =
  ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.c=
om 
    Sent: Thursday, July 06, 2000 4:49 AM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wa=
rs


    "Give them a chance, I'm sure they'll like you." Airbomber whisper=
ed back to Infectra...
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: ilov=
ealllizards 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Thursday, July 06, 2=
000 3:23 AM
      Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      *Infectra smiles wave=
s to any bots in the Maxi base* Infectra: I don't think they like me. *Infe=
ctra whispers to Airbomber*
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        F=
rom: THECODE 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Wednesday, July=
 05, 2000 11:47 PM
        Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


        "Sure, we'=
ll tell ya." Airbomber said, making sure nobody was aiming their blaster's =
at Infectra.

        "Hey, everyone! This is Infectra! She's with us!" Air=
bomber said. Plintissa growled.

        "These Radicons fired at me, Artis=
t, and Dracona when we tried to help them and ran away! I don't think they =
could be trusted!" Plintissa said.

        "We have our gestalt form and w=
e're useful and powerful." Stranato said. Plintissa walked away angrily...
=
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: ilovealllizards 
  =
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Tuesday, July 04, 2000 7:12=
 PM
          Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


          *Infectra nods and fo=
llows the Radicons* Infectra: How can you tell if one is not to be trusted?=
 *Infectra says to the Radicons*
            ----- Original Message ----- 
=
            From: THECODE 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            =
Sent: Tuesday, July 04, 2000 5:36 PM
            Subject: Neo Beast Wars


=
            Sinesis and Sinister both kept poking each other, but saying no=
thing when the other looked. They both grabbed their swords and were about =
to stab each other, but they put the swords away and did a cheesy hug inste=
ad.

            Plintissa and Dracona decided to follow Artist and they wa=
lked off to the Ark. Once there, they entered the base.

            "Hey, =
have any of you seen a bot come by here just staring?" Plintissa asked. Dra=
cona started to look around in logical places a lunatic might hide.

      =
      Deemos and Inzola got bored of sitting around and drinking tea and th=
ey left again.

            "Who shall we join with, dear?" Inzola asked.

=
            "Whomever wants out assistance." Deemos replies. They walk on u=
ntil they see the Alliance base.

            "This one looks good, lets go=
 and ask them if they have any need for us!" Deemos said. Inzola and Deemos=
 walked up to the base.

            "Ahem, excuse us, but we're looking to=
 join your fine team, we have been looking for a faction to join, and it ap=
pears that it is you who will obviously win the Neo Beast Wars, so we wish =
to join you, what fo we have to do to join?" Deemos asked. (Something reaso=
nable, please, no killing a bot things or anything.)

            Gangon ha=
d a nightmare, He was again tied to the magical chair when Sinister and Sin=
esis came up to him. Then BrightBlade did, and then Dracona. They all pulle=
d of their masks and were 2 headed, one head Inzola, and the other head Dee=
mos. Gangon screamed and held hbis head in pain. Gangon woke up, and rememb=
ered that he couldn't move. He considered that thing about getting a replac=
ement body, how it would be a good idea just in case he had to get out of t=
his dump, which was probable if he wanted to kill himself. He waited for Pl=
intissa and Dracona to come back.

            The Radicons looked at Infec=
tra.

            "Now, all you need to do is follow us, we have set you on=
 friend of the Maximals, I'm sure they won't mind, seeing as how you would =
make a great addition to their group." Airbomber said. They walked inside o=
f the Maximal base, waiting for Infectra to follow.

            Artist wal=
ked around the war room in circles, not quite knowing where he was going.

=
---------------------------------------------------------------------------=
-

------
